options.content:
See Individual Tasks for $Organization See Science Data for $Organization

Globus Tasks by Organization

This dashboard shows top tasks with the specified organization as the source or destination.
Select an organization from the list above, or start typing the name of the specific organization since the dropdown menu will only show 1000 results at a time.
Click on the name of an institution in one of the tables to go to the individual tasks dashboard for that institution and the one selected for the page.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.dst_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.internal_transfer)) OR meta.internal_transfer:no OR meta.internal_transfer:$is_internal_transfer)

meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.dst_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.internal_transfer)) OR meta.internal_transfer:no OR meta.internal_transfer:$is_internal_transfer)
meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.dst_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.dst_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.src_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.src_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.src_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors -meta.src_organization:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

(meta.src_organization:$Organization OR meta.dst_organization:$Organization) AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)
